sectionOperations.name: Eternity Vault
sectionOperations.desc: The first operation, perfect for beginners.

sectionOperations.name: Karagga's Palace
sectionOperations.desc: Face Karagga and his henchmen in the Hutt palace.

sectionOperations.name: Explosive Conflict
sectionOperations.desc: Intense battle on Denova against mercenaries.

sectionOperations.name: Terror From Beyond
sectionOperations.desc: Explore the mysteries of the Gree Hypergate.

sectionOperations.name: Scum and Villainy
sectionOperations.desc: Chase the Dread Masters on Darvannis.

sectionOperations.name: Dread Fortress
sectionOperations.desc: Confront the Dread Masters on Oricon.

sectionOperations.name: Dread Palace
sectionOperations.desc: The final confrontation against the Dread Masters.

sectionOperations.desc: Raid the pirate den on Rishi.

sectionOperations.name: Temple of Sacrifice
sectionOperations.desc: Face Revan at the Temple of Sacrifice.

sectionOperations.desc: The most challenging operation in SWTOR.

sectionOperations.desc: Enter the hive of the Mountain Queen on Voss.

pageDescription: 8 or 16-player raids with challenging mechanics. Learn about each Operation and prepare for battle.
guideComingSoon: Guide coming soon... Contribute strategies and tips!

difficultyModes.desc: For beginners in Operations. Simplified mechanics and lower boss damage.
Standard difficulty. Requires knowledge of mechanics and group composition.
The ultimate challenge. Unforgiving mechanics, tight DPS checks, and perfect coordination.

pageOperations.name: Eternity Vault
pageOperations.desc: The first operation in SWTOR. Free the prisoners from an ancient vault and face Soa, the infernal destroyer.

pageOperations.name: Karagga's Palace
pageOperations.desc: Invade Karagga's palace, the Hutt Crime Lord, and defeat his henchmen and pet monsters.

pageOperations.name: Explosive Conflict
pageOperations.desc: Battle against Trandoshan mercenaries on Denova in a large-scale military operation.

pageOperations.name: Terror From Beyond
pageOperations.desc: Explore the mysteries of the Gree Hypergate and face horrors from another dimension.

pageOperations.name: Scum and Villainy
pageOperations.desc: Chase the Dread Masters through the desert of Darvannis, facing mercenaries and monsters.

pageOperations.name: Dread Fortress
pageOperations.desc: Infiltrate the Dread Masters' fortress on Oricon. Complex mechanics and team coordination are essential.

pageOperations.name: Dread Palace
pageOperations.desc: The final confrontation against the Dread Masters. One of the most iconic and challenging operations in SWTOR.

pageOperations.name: The Ravagers
pageOperations.desc: Raid the pirate den on Rishi and face brutal leaders. Intense DPS and healing mechanics.

pageOperations.name: Temple of Sacrifice
pageOperations.desc: Face Revan and his followers at the Temple of Sacrifice on Yavin 4. An epic and intense operation.

pageOperations.name: Gods of the Machine
pageOperations.desc: The most challenging operation in SWTOR. Face the Old Gods in the depths of Iokath.

pageOperations.name: Nature of Progress
pageOperations.desc: Survive the wild moon of Dxun and face deadly Czerka creatures. Team coordination is paramount.

pageOperations.name: R-4 Anomaly
pageOperations.desc: Investigate the R-4 station in deep space. Brutal mechanics and extreme DPS checks.

pageOperations.name: Hive of the Mountain Queen
pageOperations.desc: Enter the hive of the Mountain Queen on Voss and face the creatures dwelling in its depths.

eternityVault.name: Eternity Vault
eternityVault.desc: The first operation in SWTOR. Explore an ancient Rakata prison on Belsavis and free — or destroy — what is trapped within. Face droids, monsters, and Soa himself, the infernal destroyer.

bosses.name: Annihilation Droid XRR-3
bosses.desc: A massive combat droid guarding the entrance to the Vault. Uses missiles, lasers, and area attacks.

bosses.name: Gharj
bosses.desc: A bestial creature inhabiting the lava lakes. The platform crumbles during the fight, forcing the group to move.

bosses.name: Ancient Pylons
bosses.desc: A mechanical puzzle where the group must solve combinations on the pylons while dealing with waves of enemies.

bosses.name: Infernal Council
bosses.desc: Each group member faces an individual opponent in simultaneous duels. Teamwork is essential.

bosses.name: Soa
bosses.desc: The final boss of Eternity Vault. Soa uses mind traps, falling platforms, and devastating attacks across multiple phases.

karaggasPalace.name: Karagga's Palace
karaggasPalace.desc: Invade Karagga's luxurious palace, the Hutt Crime Lord. Face his pet creatures, guards, and Karagga himself on his mechanical throne.

bosses.name: Bonethrasher
bosses.desc: A giant Rancor beast kept as a pet. Attacks with brutal strikes and throws players.

bosses.name: Jarg & Sorno
bosses.desc: A pair of bounty hunters. Jarg is melee and Sorno is ranged — they must die at the same time.

bosses.name: Foreman Crusher
bosses.desc: A massive Gamorrean overseeing the mines. Uses cone attacks and summons adds.

bosses.name: G4-B3 Heavy Fabricator
bosses.desc: An industrial droid reprogrammed for combat. Spawns puzzles and smaller droids during the fight.

bosses.name: Karagga the Unyielding
bosses.desc: The final boss. Karagga pilots a modified Hutt walker with flamethrowers, missiles, and gravitational attacks.

explosiveConflict.name: Explosive Conflict
explosiveConflict.desc: A large-scale military operation on the planet Denova. Battle Trandoshan mercenaries and their war machines in intense combat that tests coordination and DPS.

bosses.name: Zorn & Toth
bosses.desc: Two giant Trandoshans fighting together. Their swap and synchronization mechanics are fundamental.

bosses.name: Firebrand & Stormcaller
bosses.desc: Two war tanks operated by mercenaries. The group must split and coordinate simultaneous attacks.

bosses.name: Colonel Vorgath
bosses.desc: A Trandoshan officer commanding the minefield. The group must navigate traps while handling adds.

bosses.name: Warlord Kephess
bosses.desc: The final boss of Denova. Kephess uses orbital bombardments, droids, and transformations during the fight.

terrorFromBeyond.name: Terror From Beyond
terrorFromBeyond.desc: Explore the mysteries of the Gree Hypergate on Asation. Face horrors from another dimension and discover what the Dread Masters awakened from the other side of the portal.

bosses.name: The Writhing Horror
bosses.desc: A tentacular creature emerging from the ground. Spawns adds and uses devastating area attacks.

bosses.name: Dread Guards
bosses.desc: Three guards of the Dread Masters fighting together. Each has unique abilities and must be managed simultaneously.

bosses.name: Operator IX
bosses.desc: A Gree droid controlling the Hypergate systems. Color and positioning mechanics are essential.

bosses.name: Kephess the Undying
bosses.desc: Kephess returns, transformed by the Dread Masters. More powerful and with even more complex mechanics.

bosses.name: Terror From Beyond
bosses.desc: The final boss — a colossal entity from another dimension. Multi-phase fight with platforms and tentacles.

scumAndVillainy.name: Scum and Villainy
scumAndVillainy.desc: Chase the Dread Masters through the desert of Darvannis. With 7 bosses, it's one of SWTOR's longest operations, featuring mercenaries, droids, and the fearsome Dread Master Styrak.

bosses.name: Dash'roode
bosses.desc: A giant desert worm emerging from the sand. The group must deal with sandstorms and positioning.

bosses.name: Titan 6
bosses.desc: A massive combat droid with missiles, lasers, and shields. Requires coordination to avoid area attacks.

bosses.name: Thrasher
bosses.desc: A bestial creature ridden by a sniper. The group needs to manage the rider and the beast simultaneously.

bosses.name: Operations Chief
bosses.desc: The mercenary operations leader. Summons reinforcements and uses military tactics during combat.

bosses.name: Olok the Shadow
bosses.desc: A master of the underworld using droids and traps. The fight includes a unique auction phase.

bosses.name: Cartel Warlords
bosses.desc: Four Cartel leaders fighting together. Each has different specialties and must be prioritized.

bosses.name: Dread Master Styrak
bosses.desc: The final boss. Styrak uses illusions, fear manifestations, and the power of the Dread Masters in an epic fight.

dreadFortress.name: Dread Fortress
dreadFortress.desc: Infiltrate the Dread Masters' fortress on Oricon. Complex mechanics and team coordination are essential in this operation that marks the beginning of the Dread Masters' final arc.

bosses.name: Nefra, Who Bars the Way
bosses.desc: A colossal beast guarding the fortress entrance. Massive area attacks and tight enrage timer.

bosses.name: Gate Commander Draxus
bosses.desc: The commander of the fortress gates. Summons waves of adds and uses complex positioning mechanics.

bosses.name: Grob'thok, Who Feeds the Forge
bosses.desc: A monster feeding the fortress forge. Uses magnetic hooks and the environment to attack the group.

bosses.name: Corruptor Zero
bosses.desc: A droid corrupted by the Dread Masters. Alternates between ranged and melee phases with concussion mechanics.

bosses.name: Dread Master Brontes
bosses.desc: One of the Dread Masters. Epic multi-phase fight with clones, lightning, and mind control mechanics.

dreadPalace.name: Dread Palace
dreadPalace.desc: The final confrontation against the Dread Masters. One of the most iconic operations in SWTOR, culminating in an epic fight against the entire Dread Council assembled.

bosses.name: Dread Master Bestia
bosses.desc: The beast master. Summons Dread monsters and uses fear as a weapon. Add management is crucial.

bosses.name: Dread Master Tyrans
bosses.desc: The game master. Uses puzzle mechanics with colors and platforms. Mistakes mean instant death.

bosses.name: Dread Master Calphayus
bosses.desc: The time master. The fight travels between past and present with unique timeline mechanics.

bosses.name: Dread Master Raptus
bosses.desc: The challenge master. Sends players to individual duels while the group deals with outside mechanics.

bosses.name: Dread Council
bosses.desc: The final boss — all remaining Dread Masters together. A chaotic fight requiring perfect coordination.

theRavagers.name: The Ravagers
theRavagers.desc: Raid the pirate den on Rishi. Face brutal leaders in intense combat with extreme DPS check and healing mechanics.

bosses.name: Sparky
bosses.desc: A pirate beast creature. Relatively simple boss but with tight enrage timer and heavy cleave.

bosses.name: Quartermaster Bulo
bosses.desc: The pirate quartermaster. Uses explosive barrels, scatter shot charges, and area loads.

bosses.name: Torque
bosses.desc: A pirate engineer with defense towers. The group must destroy towers while managing boss attacks.

bosses.name: Master & Blaster
bosses.desc: A duo — Master pilots Blaster, a combat droid. Complex fight with phases and positioning mechanics.

bosses.name: Coratanni
bosses.desc: The pirate leader. Multi-phase fight with Ruffle, Pearl, and Coratanni herself in different locations.

templeOfSacrifice.name: Temple of Sacrifice
templeOfSacrifice.desc: Face Revan and his followers at the Temple of Sacrifice on Yavin 4. An epic operation culminating in the final battle against the reincarnated Revan himself.

bosses.name: Malaphar the Savage
bosses.desc: A savage Massassi corrupted by the Force. Area attacks, leaps, and increasing fury during the fight.

bosses.name: Sword Squadron
bosses.desc: Two imperial walkers attacking simultaneously. The group must split and coordinate attacks on both targets.

bosses.name: The Underlurker
bosses.desc: A massive subterranean creature. Cross and positioning mechanics are critical for survival.

bosses.name: Revanite Commanders
bosses.desc: The commanders of Revan's army. Multiple bosses that must be managed with target prioritization.

bosses.name: Revan
bosses.desc: The final boss — Revan himself. An epic multi-phase fight with Light and Dark side mechanics.

godsOfTheMachine.name: Gods of the Machine
godsOfTheMachine.desc: The most challenging operation in SWTOR. Face the Old Gods — mechanical entities of immense power — in the depths of Iokath. Each boss is a supreme test of skill.

bosses.name: Tyth
bosses.desc: The God of Rage. Summons droids with color mechanics that must be managed with specific priority.

bosses.name: Aivela & Esne
bosses.desc: The twin Goddesses. Mirror mechanics and coordination between two teams are essential.

bosses.name: Nahut
bosses.desc: The God of the Void. Uses anti-gravity and platform mechanics. Precise positioning is vital.

bosses.name: Scyva
bosses.desc: The Goddess of Sorrow. Emotional mechanics affecting the group in unique ways. Intense healing required.

bosses.name: Izax
bosses.desc: The Supreme God. The hardest fight in SWTOR. Multiple phases, extreme DPS checks, and unforgiving mechanics.

natureOfProgress.name: Nature of Progress
natureOfProgress.desc: Survive the wild moon of Dxun. Face deadly creatures and Czerka experiments in an operation that demands flawless team coordination.

bosses.name: Red
bosses.desc: The pack leader. An alpha creature commanding a pack of predators. Add management is crucial.

bosses.name: Breach CI-004
bosses.desc: A Czerka experiment that escaped control. Uses contamination mechanics and danger zones.

bosses.name: Huntmaster
bosses.desc: The supreme hunter of Dxun. A fight that splits the group into smaller teams with different objectives.

bosses.name: Apex Vanguard
bosses.desc: Dxun's apex creature — an evolved predator with devastating attacks and fury mechanics.

bosses.name: Shelleigh
bosses.desc: A bonus boss available in Veteran and Master. A colossal turtle with extremely punishing mechanics.

r4Anomaly.name: R-4 Anomaly
r4Anomaly.desc: Investigate the R-4 space station in deep space. An operation with brutal mechanics, extreme DPS checks, and bosses that punish any mistake.

bosses.name: IP-CPT
bosses.desc: The station's security system. A droid with multiple attack forms and add management mechanics.

bosses.name: Watchdog
bosses.desc: The station's guardian. An entity patrolling the corridors with area attacks and detection mechanics.

bosses.name: Lord Kanoth
bosses.desc: A Sith corrupted by the anomaly. Uses distorted Force powers and corruption mechanics.

bosses.name: Lady Dominique
bosses.desc: The final boss of R-4 Anomaly. An epic fight with phase mechanics, adds, and extreme DPS checks.

hiveOfTheMountainQueen.name: Hive of the Mountain Queen
hiveOfTheMountainQueen.desc: Enter the hive of the Mountain Queen on Voss. Explore the creature-infested depths and face the queen on her underground throne.

bosses.name: The Guardian
bosses.desc: The guardian of the hive entrance. A massive creature protecting access to the inner chambers.

bosses.name: Venom-drinker
bosses.desc: A creature feeding on venom. Uses toxic attacks and area poisoning mechanics.

bosses.name: The Mountain Queen
bosses.desc: The final boss — the Mountain Queen. An epic fight in the depths of the hive with swarm mechanics.
